title: Villains by Necessity
description: The triumph of Good and Light has transformed the world into a place of peace. This is bad news for the "bad guys," who incude a depressed thief who dresses in black, his short, feisty sidekick, a black knight, a female druid, a man-eating sorceress and an innocent centaur who is a spy for Good. Finding Utopia boring, they set out on a quest to restore balance to the world.
author: Eve  Forward
